meta.title: Catalysts for Food and Water Sovereignty in Africa
meta.source_summary: Compiled from Elicit AI research synthesis and verified open-access publications (FAO, UNEP, CGIAR, WEF, UNCCD).

technologies_and_approaches.name: Smart Irrigation & AI Scheduling
technologies_and_approaches.description: Enhances water efficiency using localized sensors, satellite evapotranspiration data, and AI-driven irrigation timing.
technologies_and_approaches.impact: Reduces water waste up to 30%, boosts yields in semi-arid zones.
technologies_and_approaches.sovereignty_link: Reduced dependence on external water scheduling systems and improved farmer control.

technologies_and_approaches.name: Mycelial Soil Restoration
technologies_and_approaches.description: Deployment of native fungal inoculants to rebuild soil structure, increase moisture retention, and improve carbon sequestration.
technologies_and_approaches.impact: Restores fertility in degraded lands; long-term water retention and microflora rebalance.
technologies_and_approaches.sovereignty_link: Community-led biorestoration using local organic matter.

technologies_and_approaches.name: WEF-Nexus Microgrids
technologies_and_approaches.description: Small-scale solar energy systems powering local pumps, cold storage, and water treatment using modular DC grids.
technologies_and_approaches.impact: Enhances resilience to drought and power outages.
technologies_and_approaches.sovereignty_link: Energy independence for water and food processing.

technologies_and_approaches.name: Credit-linked Smart Platforms
technologies_and_approaches.description: Combines mobile payments and agronomic advice (e.g., Apollo Agriculture, Aerobotics) to support farmer decisions.
technologies_and_approaches.impact: Improves access to finance and reduces costs via precision analytics.
technologies_and_approaches.sovereignty_link: Enhanced autonomy and reduced external dependency.

technologies_and_approaches.name: Seed Banks & Agro-biodiversity Restoration
technologies_and_approaches.description: Community-managed repositories for indigenous drought-resistant seeds integrated with soil microbiome knowledge.
technologies_and_approaches.impact: Preserves biodiversity and local genetic resources.
technologies_and_approaches.sovereignty_link: Preservation of traditional knowledge and adaptive genetics.

sovereignty_mechanisms.enhanced_autonomy: Sociotechnical congruence that respects oral knowledge traditions and co-design with local communities.
sovereignty_mechanisms.reduced_dependence: Improved yields and efficiency reduce reliance on imported fertilizer and irrigation inputs.
sovereignty_mechanisms.strengthened_resilience: Local policy harmonization and gender-focused planning center smallholders in adaptation.
sovereignty_mechanisms.community_empowerment: Collective ownership of water points, seed systems, and land cooperatives enhances governance.

study_context.timeframe: 2025–2035 (aligned with AU Agenda 2063 and UN SDGs)

evaluation.community_safety: Strong – interventions are low-risk and community-driven.
